mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_nickname, me_picture, me_name, me_email, me_phoneNum, me_gender) values(#{me_id}, #{me_pw}, #{me_nickname}, #{me_picture}, #{me_name}, #{me_email}, #{me_phoneNum}, #{me_gender})
mapper.select: select * from member where me_sessionId = #{me_sessionId} and me_sessionLimit > now()
mapper.update: update member set me_pw = #{me_pw}, me_nickname = #{me_nickname}, me_picture = #{me_picture}, me_name = #{me_name}, me_email = #{me_email}, me_phoneNum = #{me_phoneNum}, me_gender = #{me_gender}, me_authority = #{me_authority} where me_id = #{me_id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from member
where me_authority = 'USER'
where me_authority != 'SUPER ADMIN'
